author: {'steamid': '76561197962767542', 'num_games_owned': 3169, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1648634859}
review:
Quelques années après avoir fini le second opus, je me suis procuré celui-ci au prix de 0,79€, même pas le prix d'une baguette... cela dit, j'aurais peut-être dû choisir la baguette. Masked Shooters est catastrophique.
Sortie en 2017 sur Steam, je ne sais pas s'il est plus vieux que ça, ou s'il est vraiment de 2017.
La date de sortie pourrait adoucir la sensation de jeu, mais qu'importe. Jouer à Masked Shooters en 2022 n'a réellement aucun intérêt si ce n'est celui de débloquer les succès rapidement.
Aucune difficulté de ce côté là, vous les obtiendrez tous en 45min-1h.
On notera tout de même la possibilité de modder le jeu grâce à ses différentes options, rendant ainsi le jeu plus varié. La présence de 4 maps (très moches) feront que ces 45 minutes ne seront pas trop un calvaire.
La présence de bots, équipés d'un aimbot, vous permettra de vous sentir moins seul.

Les + :
- Pas de bug (ouf !)
- Quelques maps (je vous conseille BunkerX)
- La possibilité de modder le jeu
- La présence de bots pour finir le jeu
- Le prix d'une baguette
- Variété des armes

Les - :
- Le aimbot des bots
- Les animations catastrophiques
- Les textures datant de 1995
- Le modeling tout court (maps et perso)

Les succès :
- Solo : Oui
- Multi : Non
- Broken? : Non
- Durée : 45min-1h
- Difficulté : Très Facile

author: {'steamid': '76561198020889645', 'num_games_owned': 6973, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1639218981}
review:
Es un FPS genérico en modo Deathmatch en el que podemos elegir entre enfrentamientos de todos contra todos ó por equipos con un máximo de 10 bots en juego, contiene 5 mapas y 7 armas distintas con las cuales tenemos la opción de elegir batallas de un arma en especifico, aleatorias ó con todas juntas, también cuenta con 6 personajes para seleccionar que más que nada son bonos para nuestro soldado, ya sea más daño con tal arma, más salud, más movilidad ó una combinación de todas y eso es todo.

El juego esta más o menos, a pesar de que tiene dificultad easy, chaos e impossible no se siente mucha diferencia en los bots, el manejo de las armas me pareció bien pero lo que si esta raro es el movimiento del personaje, se siente como si estuvieras controlando un dinosaurio sobre hielo, es difícil de explicar pero no es algo grave se puede jugar sin problema.

Bueno, en conclusión me parece un juego básico, me la pase bien jugando y tirando bala un rato pero no hay manera en que pueda recomendarlo carece de muchas cosas y en el mercado fácil puedes encontrar juegos F2P mejores que este.

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6773, 'last_played': 1658369462}
review:
首先从技术层面上看，游戏在优化方面表现不佳。游戏运行过程中频繁出现卡顿、延迟及掉帧现象，尤其在多人在线对战模式下，网络连接稳定性堪忧，极大地影响了竞技体验。即使是在推荐配置下运行，游戏画面仍然不够流畅，纹理贴图质量参差不齐，给人一种粗糙且过时的感觉。

其次游戏设计方面缺乏深度和持久吸引力。尽管游戏提供了多样化的武器装备以及不同战场地图的选择，但角色移动与射击手感并不理想，动作反馈迟钝，操作感较为僵硬。此外，游戏中的AI智能程度较低，敌人的行为模式过于简单重复，使得单人战役模式很快失去挑战性和趣味性。

再者用户界面设计欠佳，信息显示不够清晰直观，新手教程指导不足，初次接触的玩家可能需要花费大量时间去摸索基本操作。而且，游戏内的微交易系统设置不合理，似乎更倾向于引导玩家付费购买提升游戏体验的物品，而非通过公平的游戏内成就或奖励来获取。

最后社区支持和更新维护也令人失望。面对玩家普遍反映的问题，开发者回应速度慢，更新内容少，很多基础问题长期未能得到解决，这无疑加剧了玩家群体的不满情绪。

综上所述，《Masked Shooters》系列虽然试图提供一个刺激的动作射击环境，但在实际表现中却因各种技术和设计缺陷而大打折扣。对于寻求高品质FPS体验的玩家来说，这款游戏目前的状态恐怕无法满足他们的期待。希望开发团队能尽快针对上述问题进行改进和优化，以提升整体游戏品质。

review: 이젠 기억도 잘 안 나는 아주 예전, 나는 《마스크드 슈터 2》를 플레이한 적이 있다. 그때는 스팀에 갓 입문한 뉴비였기에 오로지 '게임성' 하나만 보고 평가를 내렸고, 따라서 엄지를 내려갈겼었다. 그리고 세월이 흘러 마주한 [b]《마스크 쓴 총잡이》[/b]··· 스팀 짬밥을 꽤나 먹은 지금에서야 이 게임의 진가를 알겠더라. 예전에는 단순하게 '개쓰레기' 게임으로 느껴졌다면, 지금은 그냥 '무난한 FPS' 게임이라고 본다. 심지어 제일 처음 나온 1편인데도 말이다. FPS의 생명인 타격감도 은근히 나쁘지 않다. 스나이퍼랑 RPG를 쏠 때는 쾌감마저 느껴질 정도. 물리 엔진은 개나 줘버렸기 때문에 반동이 없다. 그래서 더 좋다. 점프하면서 쏴도 정확하게 조준점으로 날아간다. 어설프게 그럭저럭 만드는 것보다 아에 C급 감성이나 제대로 느끼라는 개발사의 선택이라고 본다. 도전과제 올클리어는 뭐 거의 애기들 장난이고, 트레이딩 카드 또한 존재해서 엄지를 안 올릴 이유가 없다. 내가 스팀 생활을 시작한지 4년이 좀 지난 지금에서야······ 이 게임의 매력을 톡톡히 깨달았다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019802006', 'num_games_owned': 1017, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1586703805}
review:
Внимание! Данный обзор является личным мнением автора. Все мы - разные люди, со своими интересами и вкусами. Доверять мне или нет — ваше личное право.

Не знаю, зачем вообще пишу обзор на Masked Shooters. Данное творение представляет собой продукт для телефонов (как практически и все остальные игры от FreezeNova), который зачем то выпустили в Steam. Это шутер от первого лица с элементами, присущими онлайн-играм по типу КС, но только в оффлайне. Никакого мультиплеера. И это при том, что в интернете на сайтах, где выложены подобного рода игры, присутствует и Masked Shooters с подзаголовком  Multiplayer Edition. Для игры по сети. Причем БЕСПЛАТНО. Теперь чутка о самой игре. Буду по возможности краток: 5 карт, чуть больше 10 режимов, максимум на 10 игроков. Все оружие доступно с самого начала - пулемет, РПГ, дробовик, пистолет, гранатомет, снайперка, пп, и нож. Стрельба такая себе, на большее рассчитывать не стоит. Прокачка роли не играет, разве что, с повышением уровня доступны становятся скины персонажей, каждый из которых имеет свою уникальную особенность по типу повышения скорости персонажа или же увеличения урона от какого-либо оружия. Катки только с ботами, чей AI (стоимость которого, видимо, как и сама игра, причем со скидкой) проявляет иногда чудеса с точностью (но только иногда), так и практически полное отсутствие реакции на противника.

Плюсы:
+Драйвовые катки (Серьезно, чего только стоит режим "Только РПГ").
+Разнообразные режимы.
+Скины со способностями (Хоть и не совсем нужная вещь, но все же).
+Цена.
+Любителям карточек и достижений самое то.

Минусы:
-Игра довольно таки низкого качества (Если сравнивать c подобными играми).
-Нет мультиплеера.
-Нет возможности поставить разрешение 16:9.
-Отсутствие русского языка (В принципе, он тут и не нужен).

Итог:
Как мобильная стрелялка, возможно, пойдет. Но здесь, на ПК, при наличии даже КС 1.6.,  Masked Shooters просто нечего ловить. Но вероятно, дело в цене. Все-таки за 30р., да еще и со скидкой, можно попробовать. Игра неплоха, здесь можно неплохо провести часик-два, пострелять, не напрягая голову. Но на большее Masked Shooters не способна.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069989806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 837, 'last_played': 1624051526}
review:
WHERE TO START?????

Ok, I picked this up with a Steam coupon.  I thought "75% off, how could I go wrong?" ...... I have since then actually purchased this game AT FULL PRICE to share with my friends, cause WOW.... what a trip down memory lane!!!!

Back in the 1990's we used to hold LAN parties on Friday nights at my place.   I owned a nice little mobile home in town, and so 8 of us would network our computers in various rooms around my house.... I ran Cat5 cable through every single heating duct throughout the house... and we would do Quake or Doom or Dark Forces all-nighters.   

8 guys, killing anything moving.... in cheesy games where the background graphics were soooooo poor (by today's standards) that you couldn't tell if it was a rock or a tree or a barrell.... but oh what fun!!

Now... it's 20+ years later.   All my crew is gone.  Married.... families... one of them moved to another state.... one of them in prison... and me... now I am in Taiwan, half-way around the world.   Those old LAN parties are gone.  The memories fading......

until this beautiful little sniper-shoot comes along.

It's a relatively simple game: Shoot or be shot.   Nothing more.   The RPG is a bit overpowered, but nerfed in that your reload time is actually considered.... The sniper rifle is a beauty.... the machine guns have a serious kick to them....  it really is just plain fun.   While I wish I could creep along in the shadows at times.... nevertheless... this is a great throwback to those days of old.  The AI is pretty consistant, and does manage to kill me often.  (My best game 50 kills, no deaths.  I was on a hot streak I guess)    There are plenty of points for sniping, if you love that (as I do) and the gaming grounds are pretty well thought out.... with some hiding spots if you know what to look for.

Overall --- it's a simple FPS.   But because of the memories I have from all those years back.... this has become one of my favorite STEAM games.   I would rank it right up there with Fallout or Skyrim.

but that's just me.

For the price ... it's a great buy.   The graphics aren't high quality.... but that isn't the point.   I would take this game over CounterStrike any day of the week.

Oh, and there is a global leader board you can get on... nice bonus.

check it out... it really is fun.

review:
[b]HOLY[/b]. [b]Fùcking[/b]. [b]Shït[/b]. THIS is the exact same as Masked Shooters 2 (I don't get how they decided to release this one after their sequel, Maybe calling it Masked Shooters 3 would be a better idea)

Like my Masked Shooters 2 review, It was mostly me pointing out problems about the game itself, More so. Was atleast playable, Where this one. Has NO Multiplayer what so ever. There was even more problems. Trust me.

Might as well review it for you lovely people to read and enjoy my rage about this game,

Pros: 
- Atleast the aim down sight is actually more proper and not glitched out compared to MS2 did. So that's something

- Oh look, The price is actually around $1.00, Now you're playing smart.

Cons: (Hoo boy)
-So... What makes this game as much worst as their sequel? Oh I don't know... Maybe [b]NO MILTIPLAYER OPTION![/b] I honestly don't know why this was a choice to begin with, As you're with only bots and no actual players. You only get achievments but that's about it. MS2 was atleast enjoyable abit with other players. (besides the hackers)

- Weapons are the same as usual, From other F2P Unity FPS games that is so lazy and just awful to look at!

- The fùcking random FPS drops again, [b]WHY[/b] are games like this look like a 2003 game that are easily program to look and run well on any PC become a fùcking mess? They don't really optimize their games that well I swear to god.

- What is with these characters you have to unlock by getting enough points to reach them? Acording to the picture you're to be a female character. But 3D Model you're a male anyway, So whats the point of doing something like that if you arn't gonna bother 3D modeling them? Most of the perks don't work anyway, So just stick with the 1st one.

- The hitboxes are just... [b]AWFUL[/b] Atleast MS2's hitbox was atleast decent compared to this!

- Iron sights need fixing, it's hard to shoot without the weapon being in your way, causing it harder to see when shooting long range. you're basically bilnd when it comes to that. Even if you're not sniping. You might as well shoot without iron sighting.

- There's [b]NO[/b] way you can avoid the "First Death" achievement, So if you're ok looking embaresed your first achievment being your first death, Too bad. Everyone is gonna get it anyway.

- I don't get why you need a rank when you're playing offline mode anyway, That's the most pointless thing to add when you arn't gonna decide to add Multiplayer

- The Bots are HARD, Good luck trying to get the rest of the achievments with them whooping your àss non-stop

Overall: [b]WWWWWWWHHHHHHHYYYYYYYYYYYY[/b] are games like these even on Steam?! You can easily find it on Google without a hassle and even then, [b]WHY[/b] would you? It's far WORST than it's sequel, And even if you want to add it on Steam, Then fine! But why charge someone a dollar for a game that isnt gonna even bring in Multiplayer?! I mean, You added it on Masked Shooters 2. And that's what made it atleast playable.

Please, For yourself. [b]DO NOT[/b] buy this game at any means necessary! You're better off to buying the sequel or even other F2P games out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980982592', 'num_games_owned': 1383, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1496485962}
review:
Fapados csapatokra osztott, illetve FFA alapú belső nézetű egyszemélyes, retró stílusú lövöldözős játék.

Olcsó, visszafogott, az ezredfordulós FPS játékok hangulatát idézi. Van az 5 választható pályában kicsi, és nagyon nagy, valamint kb 15 játékmód. Zene sajnos nincs.
A játékhoz elegendő egy képernyővédő futtatásához megfelelő gép.
Van pár teljesítmény is, amit úgy másfél óra alatt be lehet zsebelni.
A játék BOT-jai nem túl okosak, pl ha mögéjük ugrunk beletelik vagy 2 másodpercbe mire 180 fokot fordulnak, viszont ha szemtől szembe találkozunk velük, akkor nem sűrűn tévesztenek célt. Nagy kedvencük a rakétavető, ha tehetik, azt használják. Sok skin nincs, vannak feloldható perkek, amelyek fegyvereinket erősítik, vagy épp a gyorsaságunkra adnak 10%-ot, ha elértük az ahhoz szükséges rangot.

Filléres móka, csipetnyi nosztalgia, tetszik.
